law.catch_line: Suspension, Revocation Or Refusal Of Club Agentâ€™S Registration; Grounds

text.section: has violated any of the provisions of this chapter;
has misappropriated or converted to his own use or has illegally withheld monies required to be held in a fiduciary capacity;
has materially misrepresented the terms or effects of any contract or has engaged in any fraudulent transaction;
has shown himself to be incompetent, untrustworthy or a source of injury and loss to the automobile-club-service-buying public;
has been convicted of a crime involving fraud or dishonesty.
